overview: **TW: sexual assault**  A silent film about perspective. You never know what someone else is dealing with or who will understand. The story takes place at an apartment with 3 girls who are more than just roommates, they are best friends. It shows their friendship and how they are supportive and always laughing, although after one of the girls go on a date, they start to drift apart and fight. It shows the view from the roommates perspective and what they are experiencing and seeing. It isn't until the girl comes forward and explains what happened and what she is dealing with, that the roommates realize her side of the story. The film is a coming-of age drama, that shows the importance of communication, perception, true friendship and speaking out about sexual assault. However you may want to see and resonate with this film, it is your own perspective.
title: Perspective
